summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3485 for the improvement of the Alley in Block 2, Sound View Addition, being the alley between 9th Avenue West and 10th Avenue West, from West Wheeler Street to West Halladay Street, all in The City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 43232, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
